markdown: | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Mapping the Archipelago: West Wakara Reef | conc = | next = Mapping the Archipelago: Razai Passage | internalname = 03_QST_Cartographer_Four | guid = 6a28517a-af5c-4347-a3b8-461da68966bd }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis [Sanza](/sanza/), the excitable cartographer in [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), wants to compile a complete guide to the islands of the Deadfire, but he can't do it on his own. He asks the Watcher to do it. ## Walkthrough * To complete this quest, simply find the [Flooded cave](/floodedCave/) and the [Collapsed coal mine](/collapsedCoalMine/) in the Shoals, then return to Sanza. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/03_Neketaka_Vailian_District/03_QST_Cartographer_Four.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Mapping the Archipelago: The Burning Shoals''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Sanza, the excitable cartographer I met in Queen's Berth, wants to compile a complete guide to the islands of the Deadfire, but he can't do it on his own. |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Explore the uncharted islands around Magran's Teeth.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Sanza, the cartographer in Queen's Berth, asked me to make a survey of the uncharted islands of the Deadfire Archipelago. Sanza has asked me to survey the islands in the area known as the Burning Shoals. I can find that to the northeast, around Ofecchia Channel. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | Upon an island to the northeast, I found a flooded ruin, where liches dwelt. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | West of the Offechia Channel, I discovered the remnants of a collapsed mine. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Sanza.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I have mapped the islands of the Burning Shoals. Sanza awaits my report in his shop in Queen's Berth in Neketaka. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | Someone critical to the completion of this quest has been killed. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I mapped the islands of the Burning Shoals, and returned to Sanza for my reward. |}

Sanza has asked me to survey the islands in the area known as the Burning Shoals. I can find that to the northeast, around Ofecchia Channel. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | Upon an island to the northeast, I found a flooded ruin, where liches dwelt. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | West of the Offechia Channel, I discovered the remnants of a collapsed mine. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Sanza.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I have mapped the islands of the Burning Shoals. title: Mapping the Archipelago: The Burning Shoals
